reviewText:
The selection is excellent. In my opinion, the record has some of the most remarkable works of art ever created.
It was a pleasant surprise to see a so good record costing so little.

This is a beautiful composition and audio quality is quite good on the DVD. Video quality on the other hand is really poor. Picture is fuzzy and there is significant amount of chromatic aberration. There is geometric distortion in the picture. There is slight lack of sync between audio and video. It is very small but once you notice it, it can bother you constantly.
